definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag

sentences.english: Besides adding text, you can add tags and hyperlinks to the note.
sentences.chinese: 除文本外，还可以在便签中添加标记和超链接。

sentences.english: Attach the ribbon and note to the collar of the cat or dog.
sentences.chinese: 把绳子和便签挂在小猫或者小狗的脖子上。

sentences.english: There is a yellow pad on the table - SHE has read it a number of times.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有一个黄色便签纸，她已经反复读过很多遍了。

sentences.english: I take everything he says all in writing a memo on paper.
sentences.chinese: 我把他说的话全都写在一张便签纸上。

sentences.english: If you need to communicate, there are notepads to write in.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要交流，就写在便签本上。

sentences.english: Have the person sign the logbook under the signature's column.
sentences.chinese: 在便签本签名栏下签上该人的姓名。

sentences.english: Go ahead and stick a few post-its to the back for marking significant passages, too.
sentences.chinese: 在卡片的背面贴上一些便签纸，用来标注重要的段落。

sentences.english: The minutes ticked by. Bob scribbled away on the pad.
sentences.chinese: 而鲍勃呢，胡乱的在便签纸上写着什么。

sentences.english: Ask the manager to write down all of their current job responsibilities on Post-It Notes.
sentences.chinese: 让经理在便签上写下他们目前所有的工作职责。

sentences.english: Create a new note and it's automatically saved.
sentences.chinese: 创建新便签，系统会将其自动保存。

sentences.english: I found the old man I need to interviewed from the address on the notepaper.
sentences.chinese: 据便签上的地址，我找到了要采访的老人。

sentences.english: Treat the Web like your own personal notebook with this sticky note application.
sentences.chinese: 这个便签应用让你把网络变成你的个人笔记本。

sentences.english: Keep a pen and paper next to your bed.
I love the pads of paper and pens supplied by hotels.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢宾馆提供的便签纸和笔。

sentences.english: Conference table set with writing pad and pencils, bottled water, mints.
sentences.chinese: 会议摆台包括便签，铅笔，矿泉水，薄荷糖。

definition: book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
